QuestData.Title: Catching Up to Chromie
QuestData.Description:
You have helped us regain our hold on the sands, but I can sense something greater happening up on the temple platforms. Let us take to the skies and regroup with Ambassador Chronormu there.
As always, time is of the essence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Chromie on the Temporal Conflux platforms.
QuestData.RewardText: About time! Eternus might look frozen in that bubble, but she's struggling with all her might to get free.

Objectives.Objective: Meet Chromie at the Bronze Temple
